@@ -2,34 +2,34 @@
     {
       id: 'e1',
       title: 'Live at The Music Center - Concert',
       info:
-        'All events at Golden Gate Theatre',
-      location: 'Golden Gate Theatre, 1 Taylor Street, San Francisco, CA 94102',
-      date: '2022-05-10',
-      hour: '19:30',
+        'Please join The Music Center for an evening of musical performances as we celebrate visionary record executive and A&M Co-founder Jerry Moss, a true champion of independent music and arts education. \n This star-studded fundraising event will feature recording artists from the illustrious A&M roster, as well as musicians and artists who were part of the label’s synergistic scene, the epicenter of the music business in Los Angeles for decades.',
+      location: 'The Music Center’s Mark Taper Forum, 135 N. Grand Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90012',
+      date: '2023-14-01',
+      time: '19:00',
       image: 'images/1.jpg',
       isFeatured: false,
     },
     {
       id: 'e2',
       title: 'Mariah Carey - Concert',
       info:
-        "Wed Dec 14 at 8:00pm",
-      location: 'Majestic Theatre - NY 245 West 44th St, New York, NY 10036',
-      date: '2021-11-14 at 8:00pm',
-      hour: '20:00',
+        "Great music is more than just a beat, it's a feeling, and Mariah Carey is the type of artist that can bring emotions like no other. Regarded by many as one of the greatest musical acts of our times, when Mariah Carey travels to Madison Square Garden in New York, New York in 2022, you definitely want to be one of the people in the venue. What you can expect is what you have already undoubtedly heard about the show - great lighting, immaculate stage production, intricate arrangements, and an energy that is unrivaled. The tickets are already going quickly and if you want the opportunity to reserve yours, now is your best bet yet, and we have made it easy for you to do so! ",
+      location: 'Madison Square Garden, 4 Pennsylvania Plaza, New York, NY 10001',
+      date: '2022-12-16',
+      time: '20:00',
       image: 'images/2.jpg',
       isFeatured: true,
     },
     {
       id: 'e3',
       title: 'Wide Awake Festival',
       info:
-        'All events at Walt Disney Concert Hall.',
+        'A relative newcomer to Brockwell Park's busy festival schedule, Wide Awake bills itself as a 'musical melting pot', delivering on left-field indie, post-punk, electronica and techno. For the 2023 event, indie-pop singer-songwriter Caroline Polachek is headlining, with other artists like the sultry hyper-pop star Shygirl, Coucou Chloe, Daniel Avery (live), Joy Orbison, Jockstrap and VTSS billing the lineup. Produced by live music heavyweights Bad Vibrations, LNZRT and MOTH Club, it's no doubt that Wide Awake 2023 will leave crowds surprised as it celebrates artists that defy traditional genre lines.',
       location: 'Walt Disney Concert Hall, 111 South Grand Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90012',
       date: '2023-2-15',
-      hour: '20:00',
+      time: '20:00',
       image: 'images/3.jpg',
       isFeatured: true,
     },
   ];

@@ -26,10 +26,10 @@
       title: 'Wide Awake Festival',
       info:
         'A relative newcomer to Brockwell Park's busy festival schedule, Wide Awake bills itself as a 'musical melting pot', delivering on left-field indie, post-punk, electronica and techno. For the 2023 event, indie-pop singer-songwriter Caroline Polachek is headlining, with other artists like the sultry hyper-pop star Shygirl, Coucou Chloe, Daniel Avery (live), Joy Orbison, Jockstrap and VTSS billing the lineup. Produced by live music heavyweights Bad Vibrations, LNZRT and MOTH Club, it's no doubt that Wide Awake 2023 will leave crowds surprised as it celebrates artists that defy traditional genre lines.',

       title: 'Live at The Music Center - Concert',
       info:
         'Please join The Music Center for an evening of musical performances as we celebrate visionary record executive and A&M Co-founder Jerry Moss, a true champion of independent music and arts education. \n This star-studded fundraising event will feature recording artists from the illustrious A&M roster, as well as musicians and artists who were part of the label’s synergistic scene, the epicenter of the music business in Los Angeles for decades.',

       title: 'Mariah Carey - Concert',
       info:
         "Great music is more than just a beat, it's a feeling, and Mariah Carey is the type of artist that can bring emotions like no other. Regarded by many as one of the greatest musical acts of our times, when Mariah Carey travels to Madison Square Garden in New York, New York in 2022, you definitely want to be one of the people in the venue. What you can expect is what you have already undoubtedly heard about the show - great lighting, immaculate stage production, intricate arrangements, and an energy that is unrivaled. The tickets are already going quickly and if you want the opportunity to reserve yours, now is your best bet yet, and we have made it easy for you to do so! ",
